docs.snippet: For many flight passengers arriving Friday in Fort Lauderdale, it was supposed to be the start of an idyllic week cruising the Caribbean. Then, the deadly shooting in baggage claim happened. Cruises have gone forward — but not without delays...
docs.lead_paragraph: For many flight passengers arriving Friday in Fort Lauderdale, it was supposed to be the start of an idyllic week cruising the Caribbean. Then, the deadly shooting in baggage claim happened. Cruises have gone forward — but not without delays, arrangements for traumatized travelers and some dampening of the usual atmosphere.

headline.main: Cruise Ships, Passengers, Pivot in Shooting Aftermath
headline.print_headline: Cruise Ships, Passengers, Pivot in Shooting Aftermath
